changeLang: ใช้ในภาษาไทย

hero.graphicAlt: Arrows pointing into MySK from the left
hero.title: Welcome to MySK

subtitle.student: You’re almost there. Let’s set a few things up first.
subtitle.teacher: You’re almost there. Let’s set a few things up first.

hero.notice: Please ensure all data entered in each section within this page is correct before proceeding to the next one. Parts of the data entered here can take a long time to be later changed, if modification is even possible.

dataCheck.title: Data check
dataCheck.desc: We have imported your data from relevant school departments. This process may introduct some error, so check if it misses anything.

newPassword.title: Create password
newPassword.desc: For the security of you and the school’s data, create a new password.

prepareForStudents.title: Prepare for students
prepareForStudents.desc: For teachers, there are a few more things you have to do to make MySK ready for your students. Learn more in this section.

done.title: You’re all set
done.desc: Everything is ready for you to start using MySK.

newPassword.title: Create password
newPassword.desc: For the security of you and the school’s data, create a new password for MySK. Enter your new password twice to confirm.
